channel.title: Online java compiler!
channel.description: idk if someone else has ever sad this before and didn't now were to put this but i hope these helps ppl. ok i didnt want to download all of the jdk and i google alternative java compiler this site i found is not a alternative compiler but a alternative way to compile java file w/o the hassle of downloading and installing/path directing. the link is [url=http://www.innovation.ch/java/java_compile.html]http://www.innovation.ch/java/java_compile.html[/url]. and here is the instructions [url=http://www.innovation.ch/java/java_comp_instr.html]http://www.innovation.ch/java/java_comp_instr.html[/url] and again i hope this helps ppl.

its not am i not capable doing that it is just what if i cant install(no admin or iphone/ipod , or webOS{need def google.it}?) or i don’t have the room. and again i am completely capable. and what u said Graham is true [quote=“Graham, post:4, topic:222190”]If you can’t even setup the JDK and change an environment variable then the question should be asked: should you really be (attempting to) program private servers? item.title: Online java compiler!
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

i c about the downloading part. but if u want a tut on how to make it have more forms i could and i might just put it on my site and have user defined amount of forms and hope to make it ware u can upload ur compress source file to be compiled. and also make and all this stuff im talking about is basic. not saying u dont no b/c i now u now how thx Hidendra for ur contribtion to private servers.

the attached file is a html file that makes 100 forms but i had to save as txt.
if u want more than 100 then change the 100 from “for (a = 1;a <= 100;a++)” to the number u want.

Read full topic

item.title: Online java compiler!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Have fun manually uploading every java file each time you want to compile.
Not to mention:

You can compile a maximum of 5 files at a time (Netscape still seems to limit each field to one file). If you need to compile more than that at a time you can create your own version of this form locally with more input fields and use that to access the cgi-scripts for the compiler.

Rendering it useless for private servers, as they use more than five files. Or go through the hassle of making your own form for it… Just download JDK.

Read full topic
